title: The Blue Essence change doesn't seem that bad.
body:
This is entirely my experience, but I've had pretty good luck with the new Blue Essence system. It takes me about 2 days to level up, and when I do level up, I've gotten about 1000 blue essence shards per champion capsule. Or I would have if I didn't use some BE to buy Syndra at about a third of her actual cost.

So far, I'm actually pretty happy with how things went. My experience doesn't speak for everyone, and maybe I just got lucky. But, the system is new, and numbers can still be tweaked, but overall, I think it is pretty good.
